author: iSazonov
body:
Should we add new CSharpVersion7 option in [Language](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility/commands/utility/AddType.cs#L43) enum in Add-Type cmdlet?

And why we use "#if CORECLR" in the enum?

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
If it works, then yeah.

Windows PowerShell relies on CodeDom instead of Roslyn for Add-Type, so there are differences, mostly CodeDom isn't updated.

comments.author: iSazonov
daxian-dbw
comments.body:
The example above already works in beta.1, so I guess we should add `CSharpVersion7` to the enum.
As for `microsoft.codeanalysis.csharp`, it will be updated to 2.2.0 with the next refreshment, see PR https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/3887

title: Add-Type: add CSharpVersion7
